forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain. Partly sunny. High near 54, with temperatures falling to around 51 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 16 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 4am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. West northwest wind 14 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, a subdued charm pervades the air, marked by a gentle interplay of sunlight and cloud. The morning offers a hint of warmth, though temperatures rest just around the chill of mid-fifties. As daylight unfurls, clouds drift gracefully, allowing pockets of blue to breathe a bit of life into the panorama. Yet, there’s a sense that the city’s typical marine layer lingers nearby, teasing whispers of mist that may drift in as the day unfolds. A refreshing wind from the west-northwest, carrying the salty essence of the bay, plays a welcome tune at 16 to 20 mph, reminding us that this town, with all its nuances, is still very much at the whims of nature.

As the afternoon approaches, clouds might take a more central role, presenting a chance of rain threading through the carry of a brisk breeze. To embrace the day, a light coat or layered outfit would be wise, especially as temperatures slip into the forties come evening. While the weather may evoke a certain chill, the heart of the city calls for exploration; a leisurely walk through the Presidio or a stop at a local café could provide a cozy reprieve. There’s beauty in the layered skies, a canvas inviting contemplation, offering moments that compel one to pause and appreciate the rhythm of urban life.
